About

This is what I do.

Our Philosophy

In a nutshell, we are mathematicians and web developers interested in creating the clearest explanations for things we encounter in our own personal developement. Our Philosophy can be summed up as:


So we'd like to explain things clearly for our own sake, and also for anyone else with similar interests or related questions.
